p: Film thickness was measured in mm with a digital micrometer (Mitutoyo 293–340–30, Tokyo, Japan) with a sensitivity of 0.001 mm to determine the water vapor permeability (WVP) and tensile strength (TS). Results were reported as an average of at least five random locations for each film sheet (Coronado Jorge, Alexandre, Caicedo Flaker, & Bittante, 2015).
